titleInfo.title: Music Master's Keith Stegall at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum

mods.abstract: Two color window card (light blue and navy on white) announcing the Music Masters series with Keith Stegall at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on March 21. Keith Stegall is the writer of hit songs "Sexy Eyes," "I Have Everything," "I Do (Cherish You)" "We're In This Love," and "Together", and is the producer of hits by Terri Clark, Alan Jackson, Randy Travis, Aaron Watson and the Zac Brown Band.
